Html:
I am trying to incorporate RC1 into my website which has some forms that are written in C#. Could someone help me get started in converting them to VB. This is the code on one of my form pages. Thank you very much.

<script runat="server">


protected void Button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
Date.Text = DateTime.Now.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy");
Date.UpdateAfterCallBack = true;

}



protected void Button2_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
AutoEmail1.Initiate();
}
</script>

Try this. Code translated by http://www.carlosag.net/Tools/CodeTranslator/Default.aspx

Protected Sub Button1_Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs)
Date.Text = DateTime.Now.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy")
Date.UpdateAfterCallBack = true
End Sub

Protected Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs)
AutoEmail1.Initiate
End Sub
